name: Out For Delivery (badgerweasel)
description:
Out For Delivery

Controls:

Space - throw package

Left Arrow - brakes

Created as a submission to the Friday Night Game Jam #42

https://itch.io/jam/friday-night-game-jam-2020-42

TOPIC: Infinity

Restriction: Make a game with some element that goes on forever, or at least feels that way.

Inspired by the Seinfeld quote, "...because the mail never stops." And because it is Amazon Prime week. 

In the three hour jam time limit, I have the basic prototype set up although I plan to revisit with other features after judging and comments are in.
